metadata.dc:author: Hernandez Gutierrez-Manchon, O
Quesada Villar, J
Charco Roca, L M
Rubio Postigo, G
Ortiz Sanchez, V E
Bonmatí García, L
metadata.dc:description: A 28 year old woman, ASA I, who, in the final stages of her pregnancy presented with signs of neural deficit that consisted of distortion of the oral commissure, dysphagia, dysarthria, and weakness on the left side of the body. She was diagnosed with thrombosis in a segment of the right middle cerebral artery which led to an ischemic area in the right frontal lobe. Termination of pregnancy and conservative treatment was decided, with good resolution of the symptoms.
metadata.dc:subject: Arterial thrombosis
Pregnancy
Stroke
Embarazo
Accidente cerebrovascular
Trombosis arterial
metadata.dc:title: Trombosis arterial cerebral en gestante.
[Cerebral artery thrombosis in pregnancy].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista espanola de anestesiologia y reanimacion
